    DrawText(ref Renderer, in Identifier, int, in string, Color, Point, uint, TextAlignment)

    Draws text to the screen.
    (UTF-8, blended, wrapped)

    Declaration
    public static void DrawText(ref Renderer renderer, in Identifier fontIdentifier, int fontSize, in string message, Color foregroundColor, Point position, uint wrapped = 0, TextUtil.TextAlignment alignment = TextAlignment.NONE)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    Renderer renderer

    Game Renderer instance
    Identifier fontIdentifier

    Identifier to the font
    int fontSize

    Font size
    string message

    The message as string
    Color foregroundColor

    The foreground color of the text
    Point position

    Position on the screen or texture.
    uint wrapped

    Max width before wrap, 0 to only wrap by \n.
    TextUtil.TextAlignment alignment

    On which axis the text should be aligned.
